If the logo and favicon do not update af: If the logo and favicon do not update after changes are made on this page, please clear your browser cache. Since we retain the same filename after the update, the old image may still appear due to caching. Typically, clearing the browser cache resolves this issue. However, if the old logo or favicon persists, it could be due to server-level or network-level caching, which may also need to be cleared.

Ovosale is a complete cross-platform POS: Ovosale is a complete cross-platform POS (Point of Sale) system that works seamlessly on Android, iOS, Web, and Desktop (PWA). It’s designed for retail stores, restaurants, and businesses to manage sales, inventory, and customers.
Can multiple staff use the system at the: Can multiple staff use the system at the same time?
Yes. Ovosale supports multiple users wit: Yes. Ovosale supports multiple users with role-based access (admin, cashier, manager, etc.).
Can I manage multiple branches or outlet: Can I manage multiple branches or outlets?
Yes, you can manage multiple stores/outl: Yes, you can manage multiple stores/outlets under a single system and view combined or separate reports.
Does it support different payment method: Does it support different payment methods?
Yes. You can accept cash, card, mobile p: Yes. You can accept cash, card, mobile payments, wallets, and even split payments.
Ovosale runs on Android, iOS, web browse: Ovosale runs on Android, iOS, web browsers, and can be installed as a PWA for desktop use (Windows, Mac, Linux).
Yes. The PWA (desktop/web app) supports: Yes. The PWA (desktop/web app) supports offline usage. Sales can be recorded offline and synced automatically when internet is restored.
Does it support real-time stock manageme: Does it support real-time stock management?
Yes. Stock updates automatically after e: Yes. Stock updates automatically after each sale or purchase entry.
What technologies are used to build Ovos: What technologies are used to build Ovosale?
Ovosale is built using Flutter (Android/: Ovosale is built using Flutter (Android/iOS), Laravel/PHP (Backend & Web), and a MySQL database.
Is Ovosale suitable for small businesses: Is Ovosale suitable for small businesses?
Yes. Whether you\u2019re running a singl: Yes. Whether you’re running a single shop, a chain of stores, or an online + offline hybrid business, Ovosale is scalable and easy to use.
Does it support barcode and QR code scan: Does it support barcode and QR code scanning?
Yes. Ovosale allows barcode/QR scanning: Yes. Ovosale allows barcode/QR scanning for quick product search and checkout.
Can I set discounts, offers, and loyalty: Can I set discounts, offers, and loyalty points?
Yes. Ovosale allows custom discounts, pr: Yes. Ovosale allows custom discounts, promotional pricing, and loyalty/reward points for customers.
Can I install Ovosale on my own server?: Can I install Ovosale on my own server?
Yes. You can install it on shared hostin: Yes. You can install it on shared hosting, VPS, or cloud servers (like AWS, DigitalOcean).
